mainText:
Welcome to Bank of Entitlement, where your every whim is our command! Bank like you own the world with zero consequences!

Visit Bank of Entitlement dot com for more.

ENTITLEMENT STORY: So, there I was, strolling into my favorite coffee shop with my entourage in tow, ready for my daily caffeine fix. I ordered my usual triple shot, extra foam, half-sweet soy latte, only to be stunned when the barista informed me they were out of soy milk. Out of soy milk? Are you kidding me? I immediately felt a surge of entitlement coursing through my veins. How dare they inconvenience me like this?Without missing a beat, I dramatically announced to the entire caf, "I cannot, and will not, settle for anything less than perfection in my latte! This is an outrage!" The barista looked flustered, but I stood my ground, channeling my inner entitlement warrior. I demanded they send someone to the store immediately to fetch me the sacred soy milk I so rightfully deserved.Minutes later, a frazzled employee returned with a fresh carton of soy milk, and my latte was finally crafted to my exact specifications. As I took my first sip, a wave of satisfaction washed over me. In that moment, I knew that my entitlement had triumphed once again. Because in my world, settling for anything less than perfection is simply not an option.
